data.title: Guardian and Washington Post win Pulitzer prize for NSA revelations | Media

Looks Like Rome is Even More Ancient than Thought - As Italian capital approaches 2,767th birthday, excavation reveals wall built long before official founding year of 753BC. It seems to have channeled water. Around it, are pieces of ceramic pottery & remains of food.

Ukraine has asked the UN for troops
3 EU Countries Back Ukraine's Use of Force - Sweden, Lithuania, & Luxembourg explicitly back Ukraine’s right to use force against pro-Russian separatists.
Russian TV Propagandists Caught Red-Handed: Same Guy, Three Different People (Spy, Bystander, Heroic Surgeon)

Russia has ~65,000 troops bordering the rest of Ukraine; 40,000 on the Russian Border, 25,000 in Crimea. This is in addition to "pro-Russian" armed protesters already in Ukraine; Russia said attempts to expel those pro-Russian forces are "criminal" and warned it would "protect Russian-speakers".
